question.title: Capture http request body and http response body using opentelemetry java agent
question.body:
I'm using springboot 3.4.1 and opentelemetry java agent v2.20.1, it works well.

I want to capture http request body and http response body but opentelemetry does not offer this out of the box.

does creating an opentelemetry extension is the best way to do this? anyone has created this before ?

See this for more information : https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-java-instrumentation/issues/8778
